content: 14 sts graft the toe sts together these 2 sets of 7 sts using kitchener sts weave in ends knit the second sock in the same way finishing block carefully following any yarn care instructions on the ball band knit the second sock in the same way © 2024 cozysocksstore all rights reserved all patterns and photographs are the property of yulia ilinkova cozysocksstore and are purchased under the agreement that the patterns and photographs cannot be distributed copied in part or in whole re-written or re-sold without permission for personal non-commercial use only e-mail cozysocksstore@gmail com 5 finishing block carefully following any yarn care instructions on the ball band product care basic rules for the care of knitwear  use only mild detergents or regular hair shampoo  do not use fabric softener when washing fluffy products  knitted product must not be subjected to excessive mechanical stress - it may stretch and lose its shape do not rub it hard during hand washing  you can wash the knitted product manually or using the gentle machine wash mode - <wool= mode or <hand wash= mode spin 800 rpm  after hand washing squeeze the knitted product with a towel with neat soaking movements  dry unfolded after giving the product the desired shape or in the dryer in the wool mode  after drying fluffy products can be combed a little using a plastic comb like <tangle teezer= but very carefully so as not to damage the loops of the knitted fabric if you have any questions with my patterns please feel free to contact me here or at noski_kids@mail ru good knitting best wishes yulia https //www ravelry com/stores/yulia-ilinkova-designs https //en pinkoi com/store/cozysocksstore full video tutorial k2tog knit p2tog purl on youtube sl 1 p-wise ssk my ravelry page pinkoi yulia ilinkova cozysocksstore © 2024 cozysocksstore all rights reserved all patterns and photographs are the property of yulia ilinkova cozysocksstore and are purchased under the agreement that the patterns and photographs cannot be distributed copied in part or in whole re-written or re-sold without permission for personal non-commercial use only e-mail cozysocksstore@gmail com 6
